title: "Datasets"
format: html
---

This website uses a variety of different datasets as examples.

This includes:

- __Files to download:__ These are specifically to gain practice with reading in files.
    - [data](/datasets/data_files.qmd): Information and download links to various files.
- __R packages:__ There are various R packages that contain R objects such as `data.frames` and `tibbles`.
    - [lterdatasampler](/datasets/lterdatasampler.qmd): R package containing various data sets in `tibble` format.
    - [mgrtibbles](/datasets/mgrtibbles.qmd): R package containing data created for these materials.
